abstract: Morgan Stanley may hand creditors the keys to its $2.4 billion investment in a chain of Japanese hotels, when the debt becomes due in April, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Morgan Stanley may hand creditors the keys to its $2.4 billion investment in a chain of Japanese hotels, when the debt becomes due in April, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley may hand creditors the keys to its $2.4 billion investment in a chain of Japanese hotels, when the debt becomes due in April, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Will Morgan Stanley Hand Over Hotel Keys?
